description: This file provides utility functions for network reachability testing, including ICMP ping and TCP fallback checks, encapsulated in a public function.

methods.name: bool _icmp_ping(host: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2)
methods.description: Attempts to ping a host using the system's ping command, determining reachability.

methods.name: bool _tcp_fallback(host: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2)
methods.description: Attempts TCP connection to port 80 as a fallback reachability check.

methods.name: Tuple[bool,str] check_reachability(host: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2)
methods.description: Public interface to check if a host is reachable via ICMP ping or TCP fallback, returning reachability status and method used.

ctags.name: check_reachability
ctags.pattern: /^def check_reachability(host: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2) -> Tuple[bool, str]:$/
